tag_list: sharanyan, sharanyan-sharma, extreme-seo, privilegeserver, entrepreneur, lankaentrepreneur, srilankan-entrepreneur
overview:
Sharanyan Sharma, a Social Media Branding Consultant and a certified Strategic SEO Architect, is among the most renowned and successful entrepreneurs in Sri Lanka. He is the Founder and CEO at a certified SEO company, Shree Vengadeshwaraa Networks (PVT) LTD and also owns popular sites like extreme-seo, social-media-optimizations, privilegeserver, lankaentrepreneur, and other SEO related discussion networks and Online News portals.

His company Shree Vengadeshwaraa Networks (PVT) LTD provides complete SEO solutions that include growth in website traffic, advertising revenue and website UI. It also provides brand development with adequate brand strategies and statistics to help the clients establish identity in their domain. Sharanyan Sharma also serves as a premier consultant that helps his clientele to form immaculate business plan and develop winning sales strategies. He advises new businesses to form business structures and corporations along with forming commercial transactions and privacy policies.

Sharanyan Sharma, The Managing Director Shree Vengadeshwaraa Networks (PVT) LTD, is the proud recipient of the title “Sri Lankan Entrepreneur of the Year 2012.” FCCISL or Federation of Chambers of Commerce and Industry of Sri Lanka has declared the honor in his favor and adjudged him as the National Winner. This shows how Mr. Sharma handled the entrepreneurship successfully.

Sharma has immense love and interest in the latest Search Engine informatics, trends and technologies. He keeps learning new things that inspire him to stay updated and inspired in this world of Search Engine Optimization. Before learning SEO, he started his higher studies in Bsc IT with Srilankan Institute of Information Technology (SLIIT). He is presently perusing Post Graduate Diploma in Srilankan Institute of Marketing ( SLIM) .

He started Shree Vengadeshwaraa Networks (PVT) LTD in 2008 and within a period of less than four years, he has achieved immense feat in this field and raised the bar for entrepreneurship. He is an inspiration among the young entrepreneurs who have the zeal to make it big in the competitive world of business.
